org.finra.jtaf.ewd.widget

Interface IDropDown

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IEditableElement, IElement, IInteractiveElement, IReadableElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DropDown

    public interface IDropDown
extends IEditableElement
    This is the interface for the DropDown (Select) widget

    • Method Summary

      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOptions()

      Implementing this method would allow for checking which option was selected from the dropdown menu
